children.text: A batch is a single or multiple set of compounds inside a box(order)
Check out and check in compounds,maintain dates, and CDD experimental results
An order is a box that physically arrives with a shipping label on it.

A comprehensive process management tool, enabling efficient tracking and recording of orders, batches, and compounds received in the lab, establishing standards for timely information capture and maintain certain defined processes.
Contains compound information such as SACCIDs, concentration, inital and final amount
